name: deimosrising
text: Has anyone ever hit it backpack style? Is it as bad as Ray thinks?

name: farqussus
text: Sounds like a Gerling song.

name: woodenteeth
text: I do not like that band (except for "Who's Your Daddy", that shit was cool) but I understood the reference and chubbied you. I am experiencing conflicting emotions.

name: farqussus
text: Come on man, the G-House Project is disco music! The deer in you has got to get through!

name: woodenteeth
text: The antler has pierced my give-a-fuck-gland and I have none left for that band. It was an unfortunate accident.

name: woodenteeth
text: Meanwhile I saw Pre-Shrunk (mind-blown) support them at The Metro in Sydney on a NYE and I'm sorry but they were beyond dreadful (i.e. not consistent with my tastes).

name: farqussus
text:
whatever happened to preshrunk? they kicked ass.
well i never saw gerling live and they were pretty production heavy so i believe they would struggle to translate it live. it irritated me that they followed the lat nineties trend of australian garage bands turning into production teams of varying abilities, but i liked enough of their stuff to let it slide. each to their own.

name: woodenteeth
text: I saw the two bassists from the band do a Warwick Basses Christmas Party (or some such shit) on youtube and it was just as amazing as always (given, that was a few years ago now). As long as you don't buy their LPs no expectations will be deflated. The boys are in their forties now, one of them is a dance music "producer" called Hans Dirty. It's pretty dreadful last time I checked.

name: redmange
text: I'm telling you this a bit late I guess, but I thought you deserved to know.  Backpack style rocks.  Ray must have been on a bad streak when he tried it.

name: jhunt
text: They should use this strip as a teaching tool during public school sex education classes.

name: mortshire
text: that sigh just rolls off into the night.

name: ghostd
text: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Boning (But Were Afraid to Ask)

name: lexsenthur
text: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Getting your Bone One (But Were Afraid to Ask) Revised Edition [Sorry guys I had to fire my stenographer]

name: woodenteeth
text: Well, hiring your stenographer's sister obviously did not help your cause (i.e. Bone "On" not "One").

name: rapid_roy
text: If I ever got this talk, my eyes would look just like LN's.

name: wharfrat
text: "you know how to put the jimmy onto your wee-wee?" a conversation that dread having with my uncle

name: saurkraus
text: Be thankful that your uncle isn't a g-string wearing tomcat. Sorry to any americans out there that were offended by my use of the term 'g-string' in place of 'thong'.

name: steerpike66
text: This would be less disturbing if I didn't think that Americans called the things you wear on your feet 'thongs': the things we call 'flip-flops'.

name: hipjiverobot
text: In America, if someone uses the word thong, it is assumed they are talking about the underwear unless they are speaking about a middle school dress code or something of the like.

name: rowboat
text: I've never met an American who said "thong" in place of "flip-flop," and I know literally hundreds of them.

name: farqussus
text: You're thinking of Australians. And they are thongs.

name: belgand
text:
Technically there is a difference. The g-string is has far less material in the back, basically only a thin strand, while a thong has slightly more material.

Perhaps you need to consider getting more bones on.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: but "jimmy" is slang for "penis", not "condom". how do you put a penis on your penis? [cue frot pr0n]

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Slang terms for frot include "cock rub," "bumping dicks," "knocking cocks," "tummy stix," "sword-fighting," "Oxford style," "Princeton rub," and "Ivy League rub."

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "never, don't hit it backpack-style"

name: spectre
text: At EIGHT, just EIGHT years old, my stepson knew the whole routine with condoms. He picked it up at CHURCH CAMP. Oohhhh SHHHHHIIIIIIIT!

name: wargasmic
text: Wait, what??

name: choosebro
text: Who would you prefer teaching your LN about jimmy hats? Some preacher type, or a g-string wearing, legend of the bone like Mr Ray?

name: baryonyx
text: Most of the time, any convergence between the subjects of preacher types and jimmy hats is an ill-tiding.

name: carlyle
text: But not all the time!

name: rowboat
text: In which carlyle lets it be known that he loves to fuck priests.

name: carlyle
text: Do you take umbrage?

name: rowboat
text: If that means "Are you rock hard now?" then yes, my son, I take much umbrage.

name: rowboat
text: (In which rowboat makes it exceedingly clear that he's only on assetbar to talk about his dick)

name: carlyle
text: And what I masturbate to and when I finally did.

name: professoryes
text: Damn church camp. Robbing virginities since 1954.

name: tellumo
text: Why wasn't I a member of your church when I was growing up?

name: carlyle
text: I fucking hate kids today.

name: zeroasalimit
text: How to put it on? What? Is there some sort of method, or something?

name: professoryes
text: It's pretty self-explanatory until you see someone do it HORRIBLY wrong. Then you think, "O-kay, maybe a little education could work."

name: rowboat
text: Pinch that tip. No blow-ups.

name: lordhumungus
text: I had trouble breathing after reading "...you know how to put the jimmy onto your wee-wee, right?"

name: i_love_kate
text: Does that mean that you don't know how to put it on, resulting in it getting lodged in your throat?

name: aurorasbored
text: Hahhaa I remember the days when cologne was thought to be the only necessary element of sex. (Ah, the 70s)

name: zeal
text: At 97, you probably remember the days when a good corset and the union jack were thought to be the only necessary elements of sex.

name: farqussus
text: and marriage

name: cailetshadow
text: Because Uncle Ray will guide your hands for you if you need him to, son.

name: origotoshi
text: That's exactly what I was thinking when I read that...

name: sharpdresseddan
text: leave it to Ray to call it a "wee wee"

name: mercuri0us
text: Bone with a capital B.

name: gouldgonewild
text: and that rhymes with P

name: spaceandrew
text: The special strips that actually make me laugh out loud get fives. This one gets a five.

name: load_blown
text: in the first cell little nephew is on the left and ray is on the right. in the next cell they are in exactly the same positions but they should be in the opposite positions, as they are turned 180 degrees from the first cell(assuming that they are facing the same direction in both cells)

name: carlyle
text: God Ray, you just ruined everything in that last panel.
